lines.text: It's not literally smoke and mirrors, is it?
Like, all this ash, maybe some smoke from the fire... suspended in the air in a shape somehow?
Hm... well, I've run into <c=#0000FF>freezing magic</c> that can do things like that, but...
This hologram is pretty detailed. I don't think our perp had time to sculpt dust like this, even if that's possible.
